page.title: 14OUR YOUTH CLUB: SO.TYNESIDE
page.content: Our Youth Club is held each Thursday in St.Oswald's Roman Catholic Church Hall. It is on for two hours, from 7pm till 9pm. Children between 9 and 16 years old can attend. It costs 10 pence if you are a member and 20p if you are not. Non-members cannot attend until 7.30 pm. It is very popular because it is the only one on the whole estate. Up to 100 children attend each session, and ten adults look after them. We do lots of interesting things, such as playing table-tennis, darts or pool,using the space-invader machine, or dancing. We have a rounders team and a football team, and we are soon going to have a netball team.
